# openprovider Provider

## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) OpenProvider API endpoint. Defaults to production API.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) OpenProvider password.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) OpenProvider API token.
- `username` (String) OpenProvider username.
